testcase.classname: As​ a client​ I would​ like​ to​ add​ products​ to​ the​ shopping​ basket.
testcase.name: As​ a client​ I would​ like​ to​ add two​ products​ to​ the​ shopping​ basket.
testcase.system-out: Given I open 'https://www.zalando.com'......................................passed And I want to start shoping using 'Zalando.UK'..............................passed Given I click on 'Kids' wear................................................passed And I search for the word 'babies'..........................................passed And I want to make the following filters on search results:.................passed And I click on item number 1................................................passed And I select '3K' size......................................................passed And I add the item to shopping basket.......................................passed And I click back............................................................passed And I click on item number 3................................................passed And I select '3K' size......................................................passed And I add the item to shopping basket.......................................passed When I open the shopping basket.............................................passed Then I should see 2 items in the shopping basket............................passed
